mapper.update: update ujcms_dict_type set site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias_ = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scope_ = #{scope,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, data_type_ = #{dataType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, order_ = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sys_ = #{sys,jdbcType=CHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_dict_type (id_, site_id_, name_, alias_, remark_, scope_, data_type_, order_, sys_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scope,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{dataType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sys,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.site_id_, t.name_, t.alias_, t.remark_, t.scope_, t.data_type_, t.order_, t.sys_
